    • Method Detail

      • canProvideStatements

        Cache.StatementSourceAssurance canProvideStatements(Endpoint endpoint)
        Returns HAS_STATEMENTS, if this endpoint can provide results, NONE in the contrary case. Initially it is pessimistically assumed that each endpoint can provide result. Hence, if some endpoint is not known to the cache, the cache return POSSIBLY_HAS_STATEMENTS
        Parameters:
        endpoint -
        Returns:

      • hasLocalStatements

        java.util.List<Endpoint> hasLocalStatements()
        Returns a list of endpoints for which this cache result has any locally available data.
        Returns:
        a list of endpoints or the empty list
